title: Pixel 4a (Android 11) Camera: I can't find any possible to switch on or switch off (Live) HDR (+)
content:
Hello everybody,

I just got my Pixel 4a (which updated itself immediately to Android 11). I can't find any possibility to switch on or switch off HDR (or Live HDR +) ... or any setting option that has to do with HDR ... :-(

Shouldn't that be possible and how can I do this?

Thank you very much for your help!

s0nY
